text.0: Correspondence: Restoration of Iodine Uptake with Larotrectinib
text.1: The American Academy of Pediatrics has released guidelines on supporting the behavioral and emotional well-being of children and adolescents during the pandemic. Elsewhere, in a study, most #COVID19 patients with myocardial injury had underlying cardiac structural abnormalities.
text.2: I had always pitied people who end up in nursing homes and judged the families who put them there. But I had to face the fact that my parents could no longer give Nanima the care she required, and I was in no position to do so either. She needed somewhere safe to live.
